discussion.p: tweaked the definition of integral-constant-like to work with `constant_wrapper`, like so:

blockquote.pre: template<class T> concept integral-constant-like = // exposition only is_integral_v<remove_cvref_t<decltype(T::value)>> && !is_same_v<bool, remove_const_t<decltype(T::value)>> && convertible_to<T, decltype(T::value)> && equality_comparable_with<T, decltype(T::value)> && bool_constant<T() == T::value>::value && bool_constant<static_cast<decltype(T::value)>(T()) == T::value>::value;

discussion.p: This was done so that constant_wrapper<int> models the concept, but it needs an additional tweak so that constant_wrapper<bool&> does not model it.

blockquote.pre: template<class T> concept integral-constant-like = // exposition only is_integral_v<remove_cvref_t<decltype(T::value)>> && !is_same_v<bool, remove_cvrefconst_t<decltype(T::value)>> && convertible_to<T, decltype(T::value)> && equality_comparable_with<T, decltype(T::value)> && bool_constant<T() == T::value>::value && bool_constant<static_cast<decltype(T::value)>(T()) == T::value>::value;
